name: refactor
description: Clean architectural debt and improve code structure safely
steps: Scope Definition: Identify files/targets for refactoring, define success criteria
Deprecation Shield Check: Query `knowledge-graph.md` for file dependencies
Impact Analysis: Map all consumers of target code, plan migration path
Refactor Execution: Create backup, execute changes, update consumers, verify no regressions
Documentation Update: Update architecture docs if patterns changed
FS-Manifest Sync: Log all moves/deletes in `fs-manifest.json`
